## Test "r dataset()"

* Datasets are rendered as `r dataset("prestige", "car")` or `r dataset("car::prestige")`. Some other nice datasets are `r dataset("Penguin", "palmerpenguins")`, `r dataset("cars", "VisCollin")`,
`r dataset("mathscore", "heplots")`
